sentence: Leading GOP candidates Doug Mastriano and Lou Barletta even took part in Trump's fraudulent elector scheme.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Trump admits he wanted Barr to take the fall for election scheme: I said look, get impeached

sentence: "There is no one in Pennsylvania who has done more, or fought harder, for Election Integrity than State Senator Doug Mastriano," Trump said in his endorsement.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Trump-endorsed Jan. 6 protestor Doug Mastriano secures Pa. nomination

sentence: The former president also endorsed Doug Mastriano, a far-right loyalist who has promoted conspiracy theories and is the leading Republican candidate for governor.
title: Your Tuesday Evening Briefing

sentence: Republican voters overwhelmingly nominated state Sen. Doug Mastriano, one of the countrys most ardent deniers of the 2020 presidential election result.
author: Editorial Board
title: Opinion After the Pennsylvania primary, the threat to U.S. democracy rises

title: Ransomware payments spiked 70 percent last year
